title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 3-bu 「Ryouchi ni Hon o Hirogeyou!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 3 「Let's Spread the Book to the Territory!」

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上 ～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～ 第三部 「領地に本を広げよう！」
本好きの下剋上 第三部

description.en: Following a disastrous encounter with a noble, Myne finally resolves to say goodbye to her family and friends in the lower city, changing her name to “Rozemyne” and beginning her new life as the adopted daughter of Ehrenfest’s archduke. However, her days as an archnoble in noble society are brutal, as she is put through rigorous etiquette and magic training on top of her duties as High Bishop and forewoman. It all proves too much for a weak little seven-year-old girl… Or it would have, had the High Priest not offered her the keys to the temple’s book room as a reward. If she could get her hands on those, she’d be able to read all sorts of precious books! Her name may have changed, but Rozemyne’s passion for books remains the same as she charges into a whole new world! The detailed setting expands as the printing industry grows in size. Here begins Part 3 of this biblio-fantasy for book lovers everywhere!

title.en: The Holy Power of Modern Medicine

altTitles.en: To Hell With Being a Saint, I'm a Doctor

description.en:
Jin Yoosung was a gifted surgeon said to be able to bring the dead back to life. However, not even this genius doctor had the ability to revive himself. Following a fatal car crash, Yoosung closed his eyes for what he'd thought was the last time… only to wake up and find that he's been reborn in a fantasy world!

A doctor through and through, Yoosung — now Ray — resolves to become a healer again. Unfortunately, it seems his new magical abilities may not be the most fitting for his dream career…
description.ko:
천재 의사로 의학계에 이름을 떨치던 유성.
수술실을 집처럼 여기던 그는 어느 날 교통사고로 죽게 되고,
정신을 차려 보니 다른 세계로 떨어져 버렸다.

그런데.
성녀…성국…힐링 마법이라고?

"내가 얼마나 힘들게 의학을 배웠는데, 손만 대 놓고 치료 끝?
아, 나. 진짜 미쳐버리겠네."
description.pt-br:
Yusung é um médico genial e famoso no mundo da medicina. Sua vida é dedicada à sala de cirurgia, mas tudo muda quando ele morre em um acidente de trânsito e, ao acordar, se vê em um mundo completamente diferente. Nesse novo mundo, existe uma santa e um império sagrado, e a magia de cura é uma realidade. 
Para Yusung, que passou toda a sua vida estudando medicina, é difícil acreditar que agora tudo o que ele precisa fazer é tocar em alguém para curá-lo. É uma experiência surreal que o faz questionar sua sanidade.

description.en: In the depth of a mountain lives a happily married couple! But this couple has a special something on them. And that is.. that the husband is a tiger who talks and walks like a human..? The troublesome daily life between a rough but kindhearted tiger husband and a playful and talkative human wife!

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

altTitles.vi: Ta Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta Ở Tokyo Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta, Sáng Tạo Ra Đô Thị Truyền Thuyết

description.en: The protagonist Yuan Zhenji crossed to the parallel world of Jiangshi, and found that this world was full of various horror and weirdness, and ordinary humans were as fragile as paper in front of them. He used a notebook called "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals and contain weirdness, absorb the weird rule ability "use magic to defeat magic", and become a monitor who fights against weirdness, and fights with his partners against the coming doomsday-level weirdness...
description.vi:
Sau khi xuyên không tới đất nước Nhật Bản trong thế giới song song, Kanbaru Shinji có được một quyển sổ ghi chép tên là Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị Thực Lục.
Mọi truyền thuyết đô thị cậu ghi vào đó đều có thể trở thành sự thật.
Mà Nhật Bản ở thế giới này còn thiếu khuyết rất nhiều truyền thuyết đô thị từng xuất hiện trong kiếp trước như là Hanako nhà vệ sinh, Thiếu Nữ Đến Từ Địa Ngục, Quý bà Hachishaku, Cuộc gọi của Mary, Con Mắt Trong Khe Hở...
Kanbaru Shinji: “Để ta khiến cho Nhật Bản này quần ma loạn vũ đi!”
Tóm tắt theo tiểu thuyết gốc, bản manhua đã chỉnh sửa rất nhiều từ tên nhân vật cho đến bối cảnh, vui lòng theo dõi truyện để biết thêm chi tiết.

title.ja-ro: Naze Boku no Sekai wo Daremo Oboeteinai no ka?

altTitles.vi: Phy Sew lu, ele tis Es feo r-delis ec I.

altTitles.en: Why Doesn't Anybody Remember My World?

altTitles.ja: なぜ僕の世界を誰も覚えていないのか？

altTitles.en: Why Does Nobody Remember Me in This World?

altTitles.zh-hk: 為何無人記得我的世界？

altTitles.zh: 为何无人记得我的世界？

description.en:
"Why doesn't anybody remember the true world…!"  
The great war between the five races over the world ended when the Hero Sid led humanity to victory. A young soldier named Kai watched as that world was suddenly overwritten before his eyes. In the rewritten world, Sid never existed. Humanity had lost. There, dragons and demons ruled the world. Kai was forgotten by everyone around him.  
However, after encountering the mysterious girl Rinne, Kai decides to break this rewritten destiny. In a world without a hero, he inherits the hero's sword and martial arts and challenges the mighty enemy races in power. Thus begins the quest of one boy, forgotten by the world, to take back the future!
description.pt-br: "Por que ninguém se lembra do mundo verdadeiro...!" A época em que a grande corrida das cinco tribos competindo pela hegemonia no solo terminou com a vitória da humanidade liderada pelo herói Sid. No entanto, o mundo foi de repente "sobrescrito " na frente de um menino chamado Kai. No mundo reescrito, Kai viu a cena onde os seres humanos perderam para as cinco tribos por causa da ausência de herói Sid. Aqui dragões e demônios dominam o solo, e Kai é uma existência esquecida por todos os seres humanos. No entanto, depois de encontrar a misteriosa menina Rinne, Kai decide quebrar este destino reescrito. Em um mundo sem heróis, ele herda a espada do herói e a arte marcial e desafia as raças inimigas poderosas que reinam.

title.en: The Dungeon Cleaning Life of a Once Genius Hunter

altTitles.en: The Sagacious Cleaning Life of a Returned Genius Hunter

altTitles.ru: Мудрая уборка жизни вернувшегося охотника за гениями

altTitles.en: Clever Cleaning Life Of The Returned Genius Hunter

description.en:
World’s first SSS-ranked genius hunter, Kim Jun-woo.

He regresses ten years into the past after being ambushed by unknowns one day. With all his hunter skills now locked, he must fulfill his career as a dungeon cleaner to unlock them.

But this cleaner… is extraordinary!

The once renowned hunter, Kim Jun-woo, takes over the cleaning duty with vigorous determination.
description.fr:
Kim Jun-Woo, le premier chasseur de génie de rang SSS au monde.

Il est un utilisateur incroyable de capacité, mais sa personnalité horrible conduit à des problèmes avec sa réputation.

Au milieu de ses problèmes, il a été attaqué et tué par un groupe non identifié.

Quand il a ouvert les yeux, il était retourné dans le passé, il y a 10 ans.

Bien qu’il essaie de redevenir un chasseur et d’élever son rang, ses compétences ont toutes été scellées par le karma de sa vie antérieure.

Pour le libérer, il doit travailler comme « nettoyeur de donjon », un métier réputé pour être extrêmement dur dans cette industrie !

Mais ce nettoyeur, il est différent !
description.ko:
세계 최초 SSS랭크 천재 헌터 김준우.
대단한 능력자지만, 인정머리가 없는 탓에 평판에 문제가 생긴다.
골머리를 썩히고 있는 와중, 정체를 알 수 없는 집단에게 습격받아 죽게 되고,
눈을 떠보니 10년 전 시점으로 회귀한 상태.

다시 헌터가 되어 랭크를 올리려 했지만, 이전 생의 업보로 인해 스킬을 모두 봉인 당하고,
해제를 위해서는 업계에선 극한 직업으로 유명한 '던전 청소부'로 일을 해야 하는데?!

하지만 이 청소부, 남다르다!
몬스터는 물론이거니와, 골깝떠는 헌터, 자리만 차지하는 낙하산 상사, 심지어 동료가 될 사람까지
모든 걸 청소할 기세로 깽판을 치는데...

현직 헌터보다 더 강한 전직 헌터의 망나니식 청소가 시작된다!
description.pt-br:
Kim Jun-woo, o primeiro caçador genial de rank SSS.

Ele é um incrível usuário de habilidades, mas sua personalidade horrível trás problemas para sua reputação.

No meio de seus problemas, ele foi atacado e morto por um grupo não identificado. E quando abriu os olhos, havia retornado 10 anos para seu passado.

Embora ele tente voltar a ser um caçador e aumentar seu rank, as habilidades dele foram seladas pelo karma de sua vida passada.

Para conseguir libertar suas habilidades, ele precisa trabalhar como um “Limpador de Dungeons”, que tem a fama de ser incrivelmente difícil! Mas esse faxineiro, ele é diferente!

Não apenas monstros – caçadores problemáticos, superiores conseguindo suas posições por puro nepotismo, e até mesmo seus colegas.

Ele está fazendo a maior bagunça para limpar tudo. O ex-caçador, que é mais forte do que os caçadores atuais, e sua limpeza maluca vão começar!

altTitles.ja: 月のしっぽ

description.en:
Usagi is the granddaughter of the leader of a prestigious ninja village, but she's such a klutz that she's never made it out of the lower class. Frustrated with Usagi's lack of progress, her grandfather sends her to marry Lord Hanzo with an order to breed many ninja children. But the lord has no interest in her or her childbearing potential!

The last volume includes Promise of the Moon.

Related Series:
Ran to Aoi (Spin-Off)
Tsuki no Toiki Ai no Kizu (Prequel)

title.en: Isekai NTR ~Shinyuu no Onna wo Saikyou Skill de Otosu Houhou~

altTitles.ja: 異世界NTR～親友のオンナを最強スキルで堕とす方法～

altTitles.th: ISEKAI NTR ~สร้างฮาเร็มโดยไม่ให้พรรคพวกรู้~

altTitles.ko: 이세계 NTR ~절친의 여자를 최강 스킬로 함락시키는 방법~

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界NTR ～不被同伴發現地開後宮～
異世界NTR～用最強技能令摯友的女人墜落的方法～

altTitles.en: Isekai NTR: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill
NTR in Another World: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill

description.en:
This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them.

That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power…?
description.es: Este mundo de mierda que no es más que un juego basura, él y yo definitivamente escaparemos juntos. Entonces, todas estas mujeres molestas que intentan aprovecharse de él son solo una molestia. Lo que es peor, él parece que está comenzando a sentir algo por ellas. Por eso, por su bien, las comeré primero. Pero, ¿qué es este poder…?

title.en: Reborn as the Heavenly Martial Demon

altTitles.en: After I Die, I Transform Into a Martial Arts Demon
I, In My Posthumous Form, Transform Into The Martial Dao Demon
Reborn as the Heavenly Martial Demon

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Sǐ Hòu, Huàshēn Wǔdào Tiānmó

description.en:
Humanity lost the war. Businessmen who sold out their fellow compatriots, hunters who turned to the monsters, stepping on countless human corpses, all in order to earn profit. The otherworldly monsters that entered our world seized it bit by bit like a raging fire. That was until Zuo Chi arrived. 
"Back then you all were gladly invading our world, so why are you weeping now?"
description.fr:
L'humanité a perdu la guerre. Des hommes d'affaires ont trahi leurs compatriotes, et des chasseurs se sont transformés en monstres, piétinant d'innombrables cadavres humains, tout cela pour le profit. Les créatures d'un autre monde ont envahi le nôtre, le conquérant peu à peu comme un feu dévorant. Mais alors que tout semblait perdu, Zuo Chi est apparu.
"Autrefois, vous envahissiez notre monde avec jubilation. Pourquoi pleurez-vous maintenant ?"

description.en:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

altTitles.ja: 君は冥土様

description.en: A girl in a maid uniform came to Hitoyoshi's house looking for a job. Her previous job was an assassin, and she is skilled in all the deadly arts, but she's a complete beginner at housework. Hitoyoshi was confused by the strange request and sent her away. But then she saved Hitoyoshi from a deadly accident, and he thought maybe they can make this work? This is a story about a maid who was a cold-hearted killer learning about new emotions. A maid who lived a lonely life in the underworld finally finding family. The start of an enjoyable daily life.
description.id: ||Seorang gadis dengan pakaian pelayan datang ke rumah Hitoyoshi untuk mencari pekerjaan. Pekerjaan dia sebelumnya adalah seorang pembunuh, dan dia sangat ahli dalam semua teknik membunuh, tapi dia sangat awam dalam pekerjaan rumah. Hitoyoshi bingung dengan permintaan anehnya itu dan memintanya pergi. Tapi kemudian gadis itu menyelamatkan Hitoyoshi dari sebuah kecelakaan maut, dan Hitoyoshi pikir dia mungkin bisa mempekerjakannya? Ini adalah kisah tentang seorang pelayan yang dulunya adalah pembunuh berdarah dingin kini belajar tentang emosi baru. Seorang pelayan yang hidup kesepian di dunia bawah akhirnya menemukan keluarga. Awal kehidupan sehari-hari yang menyenangkan dimulai!||

description.en: The legendary cultivator, seeking excitement, decided to create a secondary account in a parallel world. However, he unexpectedly discovered…

altTitles.ja: きみは、ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
description.pt-br: Aoba é um jovem que sofreu um trauma devido a um terrível término de relacionamento. Por conta disso, desenvolveu medo de interagir com outras pessoas, deixou seu emprego e passou a viver fazendo trabalhos temporários, tendo como única alegria assistir às transmissões de sua streamer favorita. Certo dia, ao ser abordado por uma garota que costumava ver em seu caminho de volta para casa, ele acaba concordando em morar com ela? Ele fica surpreso ao descobrir que ela era justamente sua streamer favorita... Assim, tem início um romance transformador entre um rapaz de coração partido e uma streamer!

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

altTitles.en: Silent Witch: Secrets of the Silent Witch

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

description.en: The apocalypse has dawned upon the world, and food and survival are once again the most important topics of people's concern. Rice and flour have become luxuries, and vegetables are even more expensive! But just then, someone posted a video on a website that shocked the world. Sweet vegetables rolled into a hot pot, emitting a tantalizing green color! A golden leg of lamb is seared in oil! Fish soup simmers as white as milk! The little girl beside me begged: Bro,  I really can't eat anymore!
description.zh: 末日来袭，植物与水源全部枯竭。世界陷入恐慌，食物与生存再次成为人们最关心的话题。米面成为奢侈品，菜蔬更是有价无市！然而就在此时，有人在网站上发送一段视频，令世界震撼。甘甜的菜蔬滚入火锅中，散发诱人的绿色！烤的金黄的羊腿滋滋冒油！鲜美的鱼汤炖的宛若牛奶一般纯白！一旁的小女孩哀求道：哥，我真的吃不下了！

description.en: First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.
description.es-la: Gu Feiyan, el tercer soberano, muere y es reencarnado en un niño llamado Li Yunxia, una completa basura que todavía no despertó sus meridianos a pesar de su edad. ¡Pero esto no detendrá al MC de alcanzar el pináculo de este mundo otra vez!
description.pt-br: Um dos imperadores marciais conferidos, Gu Feiyang, faleceu nas montanhas Tiandang e reencarnou 15 anos depois como Li Yunxiao, do estado de Tianshui, embarcando em uma jornada que desafia o céu contra os inúmeros gênios da época. Os nove níveis da Arte Marcial; os Reinos Divinos dos dez quadrantes. A partir de então, o mundo inteiro caiu no caos!

title.en: The Role of the Femme Fatale

altTitles.ja: 魔性の乙女の役廻り

description.en:
Kairan Girls’ Academy.

A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. 

It has a special system in which students are given “roles” that align with their individual goals.

Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?

A new series by Sasuke, author of False Marigold and Be Careful, Onee-san.!
description.ja:
私立廻蘭女学院中学校。
そこは孤児院出身の子どもたちのみが通う、歴史と伝統ある寄宿学校。
この学校には古くから、生徒たちが個々の目標に沿った【役柄】を与えられるという特殊な制度があった。
心優しい少女・志村花子は「学校中のみんなと友達になる」ことを目標に、夢と期待に胸をふくらませ学校へ入学するが――？

「気をつけなよ、お姉さん。」「偽りのマリィゴールド」のサスケ最新作!!

altTitles.ja: 殺し愛

altTitles.th: โคโรชิ ไอ

description.en: One day, Chateau, a bounty hunter belonging to an assassin organization, encounters the mysterious bounty hunter Ryang-ha. After being shown the overwhelming difference in their abilities and thinking that this is going to be her end, Ryang-ha's only demand from her is to exchange their contact information. And thus started a game of cat and mouse, in which the hands of the participants are fully covered in blood...
description.fr: Un jour, Château, chasseuse de prime pour une petite société, rencontre le mystérieux assassin Ryang-ha. Après qu’il lui ait montré leurs différences de capacités au combat, Château pense que c’est la fin, mais Ryang-ha lui demande juste d’échanger leurs adresses. Ainsi commence le jeu du chat et de la souris, dont les participants finiront les mains couvertes de sang…
description.it: Quando l'esperta cacciatrice di taglie Chateau si scontra con il misterioso Ryang-ha, anche lui cacciatore di taglie, la donna sembra avere la peggio. L'uomo, però, pare aver sviluppato per lei un certo interesse durante lo scontro: l'unica condizione per lasciare andare Chateau è che lei gli dia il suo numero di telefono. Ha inizio così un pericoloso gioco al gatto e al topo… un gioco dove entrambi i partecipanti hanno le mani sporche di sangue.
description.vi:
Hai chap cuối cùng sẽ chỉ đăng trên nhóm riêng tư Thế giới nhỏ Koroshi Ai cho đến khi web chính thức công khai chap cuối!

Chateau Dankworth, một nữ thợ săn tiền thưởng, thuộc về một tổ chức giết người. Cho rồi đến một ngày, cô gặp được Song Ryangha một thợ săn tiền thưởng bí ẩn. Tưởng như cô sẽ bị mất đi công việc của mình vì sự chênh lệch áp đảo về tài năng, nhưng rồi Ryangha lại yêu cầu một trao đổi. Từ đó về sau, những ngày ăn bám của Ryangha bắt đầu..

Truyện được Việt hóa bởi Spring Blossoms Team!

//Bộ truyện sẽ được beta lại cho đẹp dần//

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...

A man who reincarnated in another world as a 9th class wizard and retired after saving the continent from a dragon war. He decides to open a small restaurant in the countryside, but his routine is anything but ordinary. 

On the second floor of his restaurant, there lives a black dragon who has transformed into a woman, named Rurin. She is greedy, cute and loyal to him, but also ignorant and clueless about the human world. 

They live a fun and warm life, serving customers, solving problems and growing violets in the garden.
description.ko:
요리사를 꿈꾸던 내가 사고로 이세계에 떨어졌다.

몬스터와 마법이 넘쳐나는 판타지 세계이지만 여기라고 식당을 못할 건 없잖아?

그러나 전쟁으로 인해 이세계에 들어오자마자 군대에 끌려가게 되고,
...

altTitles.en: Only I Farm in the Dungeon
I'm the Only One Farming in the Dungeon

altTitles.es-la: Cultivando en la torre en solitario
Cultivando a solas en la torre

description.en: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.
description.it: Un giorno, una misteriosa torre apparve improvvisamente in città. La gente decise di chiamarla dungeon, e sebbene fosse pieno di asperità e mostri pericolosi, era anche una terra di opportunità, dove erano in attesa innumerevoli tesori. Quando Sejun, un giovane che vive una vita normale, viene invitato per caso nel dungeon sotterraneo, è entusiasta all'idea di diventare ricco, ma è rimasto bloccato in una zona nascosta della torre misteriosa. Tutto quello che ha sono alcuni semi e il suo corpo. Ora Sejun deve coltivare, raccogliere risorse e capire come sopravvivere!
description.es-la: Un día, una torre misteriosa apareció de repente en la ciudad. La gente decidió llamarla mazmorra, y aunque estaba llena de un terreno irregular y monstruos peligrosos, también era una tierra de oportunidades, donde aguardaban innumerables tesoros. Cuando Sejun, un joven que vive una vida ordinaria, es invitado por casualidad a la mazmorra, está emocionado ante la perspectiva de hacerse rico, pero se encuentra varado en un área oculta de la misteriosa torre. Todo lo que tiene son unas pocas semillas y su cuerpo. ¡Ahora, Sejun debe cultivar, recolectar recursos y descubrir su propia estrategia de supervivencia!
description.pt-br: Sejun, o típico azarão de Seul não esperava se tornar um Fazendeiro quando tropeçou e foi transportado para a famosa Dungeon, cheia de missões, de monstros e recompensas misteriosas. No entanto, lá estava ele, como um agricultor cultivando e vendendo seus frutos engenhosamente, enquanto concluía inúmeras missões que surgiam em seu caminho. Será que Sejun conseguirá sair da Dungeon que está preso? Pelo menos ele tem o que é necessário: otimismo, engenhosidade e um grupo de leais amigos peludinhos.

title.en: Himitsu no AiPri Full Color Osarai 4-Koma

altTitles.en: The Secret of AiPri - Full Color Review 4-Koma

altTitles.ja: ひみつのアイプリ フルカラーおさらい4コマ

description.en: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-Koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)

title.en: I Picked a Hammer to Save the World

description.en:
If the name Tiny brings to mind a diminutive rogue befitting the name, think again: Tiny is a headstrong, muscle-bound warrior who would rather smash his way through obstacles with his trusty warhammer than use his brain. 

When Tiny and the legendary Ten Knights of Asran are defeated by the Demon Beastlord Gluttony, he is given a second chance at life as he is magically sent back to the past. 

Relying on his knowledge of the future, the young Tiny must right the wrongs of the past and prepare for the upcoming battle!

altTitles.en: I Built the Club of Longevity
I Created the Club of Immortality

description.en: Chen Li works at Mo city, he works there every day with no hope to be seen for the future… until one night. Chen Li obtains a special ability, an ability to buy “Time” and “Lifespan” from people, sell “Time” and “Lifespan” and also let things speed up “Time leap” and slow down “exhaustion time”. So he begins to build a top-class “Lifespan club”!
description.pt-br: Chen Li trabalha na cidade Mo, ele trabalha todo o dia pensando que não há esperanças para o seu futuro... até que uma noite Chen Li consegue uma habilidade especial, a habilidade de comparar e vender tempo de vida, junto a isso ele pode acelerar o próprio tempo e o tempo de outras coisas utilizando o tempo de vida que ele tem

description.en:
The maniac who was crazy about all kinds of fields such as military and steampunk had been reincarnated. However, his father was King Sejong the Great?
The mania-wise king and his crazy maniac son. Along with the ministers, and countless humans who were getting exploited.
Even today, the night of Joseon was filled with the light of overtime.

title.en: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari

altTitles.ja: スーパーの裏でヤニ吸うふたり

altTitles.id: Cerita Tentang Merokok di Belakang Supermarket

altTitles.es-la: Historias que ocurren al fumar en la parte trasera del supermercado

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre fumar no fundo de um mercadinho

altTitles.zh-hk: 在超市後門吸菸的二人

altTitles.en: Smoking Behind the Supermarket with You
Behind the Supermarket, Smoking With You

altTitles.ja-ro: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari

altTitles.fr: Fumer en bonne compagnie à l'arrière de la supérette
Deux fumeurs à l'arrière de la supérette

altTitles.en: A Story About Smoking at the Back of the Supermarket

description.en:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)
description.ru:
Сасаки, переутомлённый служащий, каждый раз проживает обычный напряжённый день ради единственного света в конце туннеля: Ямада, жизнерадостная продавщица в его любимом магазинчике.
В один день, Сасаки задержался на работе и когда он возвращался домой через магазинчик, смена Ямады давно закончилась. Однако, когда он вышел, то заметил молодую женщину с пирсингом курящую за магазином.
description.vi: Sasaki - một người đàn ông làm công ăn lương, vượt qua những ngày làm việc mệt nhoài nhờ có tia sáng nơi cuối đường hầm: Yamada - nhân viên bán hàng luôn vui tươi tại siêu thị tiện lợi yêu thích của anh. Một ngày nọ, Sasaki phải ở lại công ty đến muộn vì một cuộc họp nên khi đến cửa hàng, Yamada đã hết giờ làm việc. Tuy nhiên, khi sắp rời đi, anh để ý thấy một cô gái trẻ đeo những chiếc khuyên xỏ đang ngồi hút thuốc phía sau cửa hàng…
description.es-la: Sasaki, un asalariado con exceso de trabajo, pasa por un día estresante promedio solo por una sola luz al final del túnel: Yamada, la siempre alegre empleada de su tienda de conveniencia favorita. Un día, Sasaki se toma una cantidad extra de tiempo en una reunión de la empresa, y cuando llega a la tienda de conveniencia, Yamada ya se había marchado. Sin embargo, cuando se va, se da cuenta de que una mujer joven con piercings fuma detrás de la tienda......
description.pt-br:
Sasaki, um assalariado sobrecarregado, passa por um dia estressante comum apenas por uma única luz no fim do túnel: Yamada, o sempre alegre balconista de sua loja de conveniência favorita.

Um dia, Sasaki leva um tempo extra em uma reunião da empresa e, quando chega à loja de conveniência, Yamada já bateu o ponto. No entanto, ao sair, ele percebe uma jovem com piercings fumando atrás da loja. O que vai se desenrolar?

description.en:
"Yu Ji-han, you're useless." 

With those harsh words, Yu Ji-han, a dedicated member of the prestigious guild "Keroes" and the elite "Kim Hyun-tae Party", is abruptly expelled. After seven years of service, he's left with a meager severance pay of 10 million won. But Yu Ji-han possesses a unique ability - 'Sampling' - which allows him to see probabilities. 


[Probability of the "Very Fun Guild" growing into a large guild]

[99%]

"I will surely surpass you all!"

title.en: The Dangers in My Heart: Twi-Yaba

altTitles.ja: 僕の心のヤバイやつ ツイヤバ

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu: Twi-Yaba

altTitles.ja: 僕の心のヤバイやつ ツイヤバまとめ

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu: Twi-Yaba Matome

altTitles.en: The Dangers in My Heart: Twi-Yaba Summary

description.en: A collection of short comics and  small stories published on Sakurai Norio's Twitter.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.en: I Am the Descendant of the Divine Dragon!

description.en: In the highly competitive world of the Xuan Realm Continent, where warriors strive to refine their bodies, cultivate their martial abilities, harness the essence of the heavens and earth, and push beyond mortal limitations, our protagonist, Lu Hao, faces unjust persecution from his own clan since childhood. However, fate smiles upon him as he awakens the dormant bloodline of the Divine Dragon within him. With an unyielding resolve, Lu Hao embarks on an extraordinary journey, overcoming countless obstacles to ascend to the zenith of power. Along the way, he unravels the enigmatic secrets of his past life.

Official Hetalia AU. "This world, although similar to the one we know of, is just slightly different. Data-wise, it's pretty much the same thing, just a lot more punk and grunge-like this time. 200 crowded districts, each with a unique culture and history of their own, each with a boss in charge, in a spinning circle of harmony and chaos. Yet a new disruption was about to arise."

Yuhyeon becomes the youngest CEO of Hansung, a successful electronics company built on toxic work culture, but nobody he cares about is there to celebrate with him. After a night of drinking and wondering if he could change the past, he wakes up the next morning, 20 years younger at the beginning of his career.Armed with the experience and insights that made him CEO, Yuhyeon begins to revisit broken relationships and battle the enablers of Hansung’s cut-throat work environment. But he does not yet know how changing the past will affect his future...  (Source: Webtoons)

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=751168)

---
**Official Translations:** [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/drama/a-mans-man/list?title_no=2876), [Chinese (Simplified Characters) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/nanzihan/list?title_no=1548), [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/city-office/a-mans-man/list?title_no=3278),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/the-man/list?title_no=2257), [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001100)
description.ru: Хан Ю Хён, лучший офисный работник на небесах и на земле. Потеряв все, он вернулся в прошлое и изменил свою жизнь!

description.en:
Cheon Sunwoo, a timid, fearful student, gains the ability to see the future.
If one cannot avoid fate, then stand against that fate.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=10442873)
description.ko:
겁 많은 학생 천선우에게
 미래를 보는 능력이 생긴다
 운명을 피할 수 없다면
 그 운명에 맞서라

altTitles.ja: デビィ・ザ・コルシファは負けず嫌い

altTitles.en: Debby the little lucifer is emulous

description.en:
*"I know! I'll destroy some humans to kill time!"*   
  
The strongest demon ever makes an unexpected appearance! But she's… a total airhead?! A comedy about a clumsy but emulous demon trying to kill time begins!

title.en: Eiyuu to Kenja no Tensei Kon: Katsute no Koutekishu to Kon'yakushite Saikyou Fuufu ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 英雄と賢者の転生婚　～かつての好敵手と婚約して最強夫婦になりました～

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and a Sage
The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and a Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple
The Hero and the Sage, Reincarnated and Engaged

altTitles.pt-br: Reencarnado • O herói se casa com o sábio ~Depois de ficar noivo de um ex-rival, nos tornamos o casal mais forte~

description.en:
Reid, a young hero with the strongest physical strength, and Elria, a beautiful sage with the strongest magic prowess. They continued to fight as rivals in opposing enemy nations, but their relationship came to an end with the sudden death of Elria… Then, a thousand years later, Reincarnated in a world where magic reigns supreme, but he who has retained the strongest physical strength from his previous life, Reid, was reunited with Elria, who has also been reincarnated―

“Hey, Reid— I want you to marry me.”
“…Huh?”

The two, who have become the strongest unaware lovey-dovey couple in a thousand years, enrolled in the Royal Magic Academy to decide who is stronger!

---
**Links** 
* [NovelUpdates](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/reincarnated-%e2%80%a2-the-hero-marries-the-sage-after-becoming-engaged-to-a-former-rival-we-became-the-strongest-couple/) (Temporary, Bug cuts this url when saved in the NU field)
description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?
description.pt-br:
Reid, um jovem herói com a maior força física, e Elria, uma bela sábia com a maior habilidade mágica.

Eles continuaram a lutar como rivais em nações inimigas opostas, mas seu relacionamento chegou ao fim com a morte repentina de Elria... Então, mil anos depois,

Reencarnou em um mundo onde a magia reina suprema, mas aquele que manteve a força física mais forte de sua vida anterior, Reid, se reuniu com Elria, que também reencarnou—

"Ei, Reid, quero que você se case comigo."

"…Huh?"

Os dois, que se tornaram o casal amoroso inconsciente mais forte em mil anos, matricularam-se na Royal Magic Academy para decidir quem é mais forte!

description.en: “R“ or rather Room 402 is the room where our illustrious female main character lives. One day which seems to be by mere coincidence her fate intertwines with that of Sasamoto, a savvy man who seems to be down in the dumps. That is until he picks up a trinket which fell from her nether regions. Prepare yourself for a story of sexual psychological horror as Sasamoto enters into a brave new world.

title.en: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku ~Saikyou nano wa Fuyou Zaiko no Item deshita~

altTitles.ja: 召喚された賢者は異世界を往く ～最強なのは不要在庫のアイテムでした～

altTitles.en: A Sage Is Summoned to Another World: The Undesired Items Are Now the Strongest

altTitles.es-la: El sabio es invocado a otro mundo ~Los artículos más fuertes eran los menos deseados del inventario~

altTitles.ko: 소환된 현자는 이세계를 누빈다 ~최강인 것은 필요없는 재고 아이템이었습니다~

altTitles.zh-hk: 被召喚的賢者前往異世界～廢棄庫存道具才是最強～

altTitles.zh: 被召唤的贤者前往异世界～废弃库存道具才是最强～

altTitles.en: Wise Man Is Summoned to Another World ~The Strongest Items Were Those Less Desired in Inventory~

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9275ei/) (Japanese)

altTitles.en: Goodbye Dragon Life, Hello Human Life

altTitles.ru: Прощай, жизнь дракона, Здравствуй, жизнь человека

altTitles.ja: さようなら竜生こんにちは人生

description.en:
The strongest and oldest dragon who had lived through eternity allowed himself to be killed by Hero. Just as he prepared for eternal sleep, he realized himself reborn as Dran, a villager in the frontier.

Working the field, hunting forest animal, and having a warm life has filled his heart with joy he never experienced in his whole dragon life.

One day, when he's patroling the forest near his village, he encountered a powerful demon army


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kuronotokuroe)
description.es:
El Dragón más antiguo y poderoso del mundo se cansó de su vida, así que elige morir cuando los héroes vengan por él. Pero sucede un giro inesperado después de su muerte, fue reencarnado como un humano. Él en su alivio, decide vivir una vida como un humano en todo su esplendor, y recupera su voluntad de vivir… pero debido a su gran cantidad de poder mágico, él resulta envuelto en muchos problemas, así que su misión es acabar con todo lo que moleste su tranquilidad, y así disfrutar de su nueva vida con los amigos que encuentra en el camino.  


---

altTitles.ja: 飛雷刀

description.en:
A young orphan was alone in the world until he meets the master of a secret form of martial arts. To learn these otherworldly techniques, he will need to endure years of his sadistic teacher’s grueling and weird training. But why does he have to do laundry, cook meals, or play instruments to learn martial arts anyway?! If he can survive long enough (and if his massive ego doesn’t get in the way), he just might be able to wield the unstoppable lightning knives. Will he make the cut or be sliced down to size?

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ja:
5歳の時母親が亡くなり、10歳の時伝染病で父親まで亡くなった少年「飛雲」。彼は彫刻家だった父からその才能を受け継いでいた。 両親の木像を作り、二人の墓の前にそなえたある日、それを見た老人から「自分を師匠にすれば天下一の武術を教えよう」と話しかけられる。怪しいとは思ったものの老人が見せた武術に惹かれその申し出を受けてしまった飛雲。案の定、武術などろくに教えず、訓練といいながら家事と金稼ぎばかり… そんなある日、女装して働いている酒楼で偶然武林盟主の娘である「羅 香凜」の命を救った。飛雲は男であることを隠して香凜と親しくなるが…

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ko:
홀로 길러주신 아버지를 돌림병으로 잃고 10세의 어린 나이에 혈혈단신이 된 비류연.
조각가였던 아버지에게 배운 기술로 부모님의 조각상을 만들어 두 분의 묘 앞에 세워두는데,
지나가던 노인이 그걸 보더니 자신을 사부로 삼으면 천하제일 무공을 가르쳐주겠다고 한다.

수상쩍지만 달리 갈 곳도 없고, 그럴듯해 보이는 무공에 혹해 비류연은 그를 따라가고 마는데…

그날 이후 비류연을 길러준 것은 팔할이 바람이었다.

오늘 하루는 좀 편안했으면 좋겠다는 바람!
사부가 더 늙으면 울 때까지 구박해주겠다는 바람!
아니 다 필요 없고 여기서 탈출하고 싶다는 바람!
하늘이여 저한테 왜 이러세요 제발 살려주세요… 하는 바람!

하늘이 비류연의 바람을 들어준 것일까.
무식한 가사노동과 피골상접 과로사를 야기할 것 같던 돈벌이로 점철된 삶 속에서
깨알같이 사부 몰래 힘을 비축하던 비류연은 드디어 어느 날 깨닫는다.

‘오늘이 바로 그날이다!’

사부를 따돌릴 꿀떡(?)을 던져놓고는 무한한 용기를 발휘해 묵금과 비뢰도까지 다 들고 튄 비류연.

혹자는 강호를 두고 시산혈해 위에 암투로 쌓아올린 백척간두의 세계라고 하나,
비류연에겐 드넓은 꿀 천지에 온실 속의 화초들이 노니는 안락한 신세계로만 보였는데…!

비류연의 행복은 과연 언제까지 갈 것인가!

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ru:
В 10 лет Би Рю Ён становится сиротой, потеряв последнего родственника, своего отца.

Будучи хорошим сыном и отличным подмастерьем весьма талантливого ремесленника, он решает соорудить две прекрасные статуи в память о своих родителях. Так, когда работа была практически завершена, к нему неожиданно обратился некий старый мастер, пожелав стать наставником парня, и обещая обучить самому могущественному искусству во всей Поднебесной.

Жажда до силы превозмогает сомнения. И он решает последовать за стариком… 

С этого момента... жизнь круто изменилась. Невыносимые тренировки и серьезные наказания следовали по пятам день за днём! Иногда казалось, труд настолько изматывал мальчика, что кожа прилипала к костям, а смерть от переутомления уже маячила на горизонте. Много раз Рю Ён хотел бросить всё и покинуть наставника. Возгласы, «О Небо, за что мне всё это?! Кто-нибудь, спасите меня!» - не сходили с его уст. Но Небеса оставались безмолвны.

И вот, в один из множества преисполненных изнеможением и страданиями дней, когда сил осталось с кунжутное зёрнышка, он понял: «Это оно!»

Сегодня Рю Ён превзойдёт своего учителя и узнает, что такое "Меч разящего грома".

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

description.en:

Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.
description.pt-br:
As experiências diárias de garotas monstro modernas.
Quadrinhos originais por Shepherd0821

description.en: Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??
description.ko:
어느 날 갑자기 생긴 글 쓰는 능력,
보조작가로 구르던 나 김진우에게도 스타작가의 길이 열렸다! 가즈아~~!
.
.
[시스템 : 제한 시간 내에 랜덤 배정된 장소에서만 글쓰기 능력이 실현됩니다^^!
장소 : 한라산/제한 시간 : 20시간]
"...네?"(김진우/서울시)

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

altTitles.ja: 今日おさ

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
description.es-la: Kaede Yuzuki siempre deseó tener un amigo de la infancia como en los mangas que lee. Cuando se mudó al lado de su compañero de clase, Kouhei Aida, él dijo que haría cualquier cosa para ayudarla. Entonces, ¡ella le pidió que fuera su amigo de la infancia! ¡Los dos tienen divertidas aventuras recreando todas las cosas que deberían hacer los amigos de la infancia!

title.en: When the Black Wolf Calls Me

altTitles.en: When the Black Wolf Beckons Me

description.en:
"You can never have me. The one who can kill me, is me, not you."

Yeonwoo killed herself in front of her ex-husband who murdered her family. Yet, she found herself back again.

To escape from my ex-husband Hyojo's obsession, to protect my family and to protect myself... I ask another man to take me.

"Hwita, I'll be your woman!"

altTitles.ja: 伊月くんは正されたい

description.en: Itsuki-kun has someone he’s interested in—a senior, Ririko-senpai, the president of the disciplinary committee! In his efforts to talk to her, he purposely messes up his uniform, but Ririko is always one step ahead—?! A heartwarming, dedicated youth romantic comedy begins!

Having never done anything bad and lived a dilligent life, Shushu is suddenly framed for murder and imprisoned in a prison for women.
In order to survive amongst harsh and vicious criminals.

“W-Will you be my prison wife?”

She becomes the wife of her very pretty but very scary roommate, who is also the prettiest(?) girl in the prison, Minicat.

But something is weird.

Why is she suddenly having the kind of feelings she would have for a man for this beautiful Minicat instead?

“It’s a rule, cabbage. Close your eyes when we kiss and I’ll treat you nicely.”

This work contains controversial content such as violence and rape.

 Please be advised. Captain 'Leon Winston' of the National Intelligence Division of the Western Command of the Rippon Kingdom. Unlike his elegant and noble appearance, he was the object of both envy and damnation for both his allies and enemies, known as the "Vampire of Camden" who would torture the rebels cruelly.

"Every time I see you, I just want to thrust my gun in your tight space."

Strangely, the maid of the interrogation room "Sally Briston" became the object of his desires, as strong as the rage he has for the insurgent rebels. She was ordinary and nothing special... Perhaps it was simply the smell of blood on her that excited him.

The interrogation didn't take long.

He realized it as soon as he heard her name come out from the rebel spy's lips. He no longer needed to suppress his violent desires.

"I stopped myself from tormenting her because I thought she was a good girl, but now there's no need for that. Thank you, Sally. No... Grace."

If you want to live, then try begging.

You never know.

I might hear you out.

'Hayoon' faints when making eye contact with others. She meets two men with whom she doesn’t faint with. However, both seem to strangely dislike Hayoon… Can Hayoon overcome her ‘fainting phobia’ while being with them?

Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
description.fr: La vie de Na Hae-soo se désintègre lorsque son mari la trahit en ayant une liaison, la laissant accablée de dettes et perdant leur enfant. Dans un coup dévastateur, elle le surprend avec une femme plus jeune. Brisée et désespérée, Na Hae-soo sent sa vie s'effondrer autour d'elle. Cependant, un jeune homme mystérieux entre soudainement dans sa vie, lui demandant de lui enseigner l'amour adulte. Sa vulnérabilité et sa sincérité commencent à éveiller des émotions en Na Hae-soo, l'incitant à reconsidérer son chemin vers l'avenir.
description.id: Kehidupan Na Haesoo berubah ketika suaminya mengkhianatinya dengan berselingkuh, membuatnya terlilit hutang dan kehilangan anak mereka. Setelah itu, ia mendapati suaminya bersama seorang wanita yang lebih muda. Dengan perasaan hancur dan putus asa, Na Haesoo merasa kehidupannya di sekelilingnya runtuh dan hancur. Namun, seorang pemuda misterius tiba-tiba memasuki hidupnya, Beom Taeha, yang meminta untuk diajari tentang cinta orang dewasa. Keluguan dan ketulusannya mulai mengusik emosi dalam diri Na Haesoo, dan menantangnya untuk mempertimbangkan kembali langkah apa yang akan diambil.
